publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3586 Robin Harper: Fairtrade Universities—That the Parliament congratulates the University of Edinburgh on its fifth year as a leading Fairtrade University; notes that Dundee, Aberdeen, Heriot-Watt, Edinburgh Napier and St Andrews universities are all running events promoting Fairtrade Fortnight on their campuses; recognises the very positive impact that fair trade has on producers in developing countries, and urges all higher education institutions in Scotland to take steps to back the Fair Trade Nation campaign.
S3M-3586 Fairtrade Universities (lodged on 2 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-3586 Robin Harper: Fairtrade Universities—That the Parliament congratulates the University of Edinburgh on its fifth year as a leading Fairtrade University; notes that Dundee, Aberdeen, Heriot-Watt, Edinburgh Napier and St Andrews universities are all running events promoting Fairtrade Fortnight on their campuses; recognises the very positive impact that fair trade has on producers in developing countries, and urges all higher education institutions in Scotland to take steps to back the Fair Trade Nation campaign. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Jim Tolson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Jack McConnell*, Ken Macintosh*, Bill Kidd*, Helen Eadie*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Trish Godman*, George Foulkes*, Hugh Henry*, Claire Baker*, Jackie Baillie*, Patricia Ferguson*, Michael Matheson*, Alasdair Allan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Nanette Milne*
S3M-3586 Fairtrade Universities (lodged on 2 March 2009) Marlyn Glen*
S3M-3586 Fairtrade Universities (lodged on 2 March 2009) Sarah Boyack*
S3M-3586 Fairtrade Universities (lodged on 2 March 2009) Mary Mulligan*
S3M-3586 Fairtrade Universities (lodged on 2 March 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-3586 Fairtrade Universities (lodged on 2 March 2009) Cathy Peattie*
S3M-3586 Fairtrade Universities (lodged on 2 March 2009) Angela Constance*
